query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Innovation Management & Quality Report (c)
result.description: The first version of the report contains the plans to be followed during the project for ensuring the best possible path to innovation quality in SPIRIT The updates in M16 M36 specify updates and recommendations for raising the quality standards of the project and an analysis of the innovation process as it has been progressed in the projects duration

result.title: Dissemination materials
result.description: Dissemination materials month 2Task leader will be PP2 PTAThe goal of the task is to provide local regional and global visibility for the project and its outcomes as well as raise awareness on the possibilities for the innovation agencies in general All significant project actions implemented will be presented at a regional meetings of each partners country and published online to disseminate the findings to the target groups In addition the partners involved in international networks will arrange for sessions to topics relevant for the project Each partner will assign at least one staff member responsible for the external communication and dissemination activitiesThe activities will also include sharing of experiences with the wider public participation in relevant events media coverage etc The task also includes activities for wider network building including contacts with investorsPartnership activities include dissemination via their channels and sharing project content

result.title: Dissemination activities and impact report Version 2
result.description: Measure and monitor the dissemination activities outreach results as well as other measurable impact objectives for the project Assessment of activities includes the following list of KPIs Website and Social media Number of webpage visits 150 000 Geographic coverage 10 different countries Number of posts in the social media pages 100 Number of people reached the posts in social media pages 50 000 Number of YouTube views 100 000Dissemination materials Number of brochures 50 000 Number of press releases 10 Number of nonacademic publications 5 Number of poster presentations 5Dissemination activities Number of attended events 30 Number of presentations to external events 10 Number of live demonstrations 10
